roleset.name: branch, fork, split
roleset.note: BRANCH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'branch' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry, no Framenet entry. Comparison with 'diversify'. (from branch.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: [Sansui]-2 was late into the mini-component business and failed *trace*-2 to branch into other new businesses.

roleset.name: branch, fork, split
roleset.note: BRANCH_OUT-V NOTES: Branch out is probably more common. (from branch.02-v)

example.name: phrasal variant
example.text: For its future strategy, Columbia officials said the thrift may branch out into commercial lending or managing outside investments , as well as beefing up more traditional thrift activities.
example.arg: into commercial lending or managing outside investments, as well as beefing up more traditional thrift activities
